400.description:
"error": "username must be unique"
OR
"error": "required information missing"

requestBody.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to create a new user.

post.description: Post new listing. You must provide authorization token in header.

put.description:
Provide bearer token in the Authorization header.
All body fields are optional. Only provided fiels will be updated.

delete.description:
Delete listing.
Provide bearer token in the Authorization header.

get.description: Get all listings from spesified location
Get all listings in spesified category
Get all listings with specified date. Example: /listings/date/20220226

post.description:
Login to application.
Successful login returns bearer token which can used to create, modify and delete user postings.
